My Skills

I am a creative problem solver. I build fullstack web and mobile applications; video games and video game engines. I use C#, C++, SQL, ASP.net, Javascript, Visual Basic, SDL, Direct X, Unity, Xamarin, Bootstrap, HTML and CSS
